name: Firefox 35+: Slim Developer Edition Theme
description: Better version of Developer Edition Theme.
additional_info:
How to install properly:
1. Go to about:config, set “browser.devedition.theme.enabled” to true, and set “devtools.theme” to light.
2. Install Tab Mix Plus and enable multi-row mode, enable new tab button and close tab button on right side, set minimum tab width to 100 pixels and maximum tab width to 250 pixels
3. Install Private Tab extension (private tabs will be displayed in red) and disable these options: extensions.privateTab.stylesHighPriority, extensions.privateTab.stylesHighPriority.tree, and extensions.privateTab.usePrivateWindowStyle
4. Install Classic Theme Restorer and enable these options: “Restore empty favicon” and “Private browsing: hide mask indicator”
5. Enable titlebar in customize mode
6. Install this style
7. Restart your browser
